bs-flaggedrevsconnector-extension-descri: Adds support for FlaggedRevs to a range of other extensions.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-DraftGroups: Show unstable pages for following groups
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-autoreview: Automatically set the page to stable, when the workflow was finished successfully
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-autodeletew: Automatically delete the workflow, when a page was marked as stable
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-unmarked-d: There are no accepted versions of this page.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-draft-desc: This is a draft version with [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}|action=history}} $1 changes in review]. The corresponding [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}|stable=1}} stable version] was accepted on $2.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-pending-de: There are pending changes waiting for acceptance. [$1 Review now].
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-review-help: On acceptance, this draft version will replace the current stable version of the page. Do you want to accept the draft version?
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-bookshelfsh: Bookshelf: List pages without stable revision
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pref-uemodulepdf: UEModulePDF: Show FlaggedRevs info below main heading
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-EReview-compl: Notify when page has been reviewed
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-subject-re-ar: The page "$1" has been reviewed by $2
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-text-re-artic:
The page "$1" for which you are registered as a responsible editor has been reviewed by $2.
After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link:
		$3
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-response-success: Page successfully reviewed. The page will be reloaded now.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-response-failure: An error occurred. Please contact your administrator.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flagnow-title: Click here to change the state to 'accepted'
bs-frc-document-state-sesp-desc: The state of the page. Can be 'Accepted' (latest version has been sucessfully reviewed), 'In revision' (there is a draft version of that page) or 'Acceptance requested' (a review workflow has been started on the existing draft version).
bs-frc-approval-date-sesp-desc: The date and time of the successful review of that page
bs-frc-approval-user-sesp-desc: The user that reviewed the page
bs-frc-document-version-sesp-desc: The number of accepted revisions in the page history
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flyout-intro: Here you can see the current acceptance state of the page and accept new versions.
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-flyout-state-int: State of acceptance for this page:
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-pagetool-switcht: Switch to the latest draft version of this page
Switch to the accepted version of this page
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-draft-lockdown-r: The action "$1" for the draft version of this page is only available for the {{PLURAL:$2|group|groups}} $3
bs-frc-pageinfoelement-tooltip-first-dra: This page is a first draft
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-notenabled: FlaggedRevs is not enabled for this page
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-implicit-d: Page is approved, but there are changes in included resources
bs-flaggedrevsconnector-state-draft-reso: Page is a draft due to changes in included resources
